scenario_text.value: Huh? A text?
Kaito got one just now?

Yeah, completely out of nowhere. And it was
less garbled than before.
Are you serious? What did it say?

Uh, something about picking you up and
getting milk?
So it was from Mom?!
I...guess? Did you get one too?

Hold on, I’ll check! If Kaito got one, then
I’m sure I...
Oh... I...didn’t get anything.

(Oh no, she looks like she’s about to cry.
I should say something to cheer her up.)

(Probably the best thing to do would be to
say it was just some weird coincidence,)

(though I could ask if she’s actually feeling
jealous about this.)
(How should I cheer up Miu?)
Say it’s coincidence.
Ask if she’s jealous.
Say it’s coincidence.

Listen, I’m sure it’s just some weird
coincidence.
I don’t know...

No, really! Remember how time works
differently in this world than in ours?

And hey, I didn’t get a message on my phone
either.
You...you didn’t?

No, I didn’t. So I don’t think you should be
concerned about not getting one.
Ask if she’s jealous.

Wait, are you actually jealous about this?
You’re not really feeling left out, are you?
(Oh no, she looks really upset...)
This is... This is messed up!
(Oh no...now she’s definitely going to cry.)
It’s not fair!

I’m so yelling at Mom when we get back home!
Telling her she’s too worried about Kaito!

(Well...she didn’t cry. But I guess she
really was feeling left out.)

You do that! Really give her a piece of your
mind when you get back home.
Eheheh, I will!

I’m yelling at Mom when we get back! I’m
gonna tell her she should text me too!
